rook.api.transport

Interface UnicastTransport

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SimpleUnicastTransport

    public interface UnicastTransport
    Transport for unicast messages. Unicast messages are sent directly to an explicit service.
    Author:
    Eric Thill

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<GrowableBuffer>> consumer)
      Add a unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to this service from all other services.

    • Method Detail

      • addMessageConsumer

        void addMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<GrowableBuffer>> consumer)
        Add a unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to this service from all other services.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The message consumer

      • addMessageConsumer

        <T> void addMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<T>> consumer,
                            Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Add a deserializing unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to this service from all other services.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The message consumer
        deserializer - The deserializer that converts a binary message into an object to be consumed

      • addMessageConsumer

        void addMessageConsumer(RID from,
                        java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<GrowableBuffer>> consumer)
        Add a unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to this service from the given service.
        Parameters:
        from - The service to listen to. Only messages from this service ID will be passed to the consumer.
        consumer - The message consumer

      • addMessageConsumer

        <T> void addMessageConsumer(RID from,
                            java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<T>> consumer,
                            Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Add a deserializing unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to this service from the given service.
        Parameters:
        from - The service to listen to. Only messages from this service ID will be passed to the consumer.
        consumer - The message consumer
        deserializer - The deserializer that converts a binary message into an object to be consumed

      • removeMessageConsumer

        <T> void removeMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<T>> consumer)
        Remove a consumer. The given consumer will stop receiving message callbacks.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The consumer to remove

      • send

        void send(RID toService,
          GrowableBuffer message)
        Send a unicast message to the given service
        Parameters:
        toService - The service to send the message to
        message - The message

      • send

        <T> void send(RID toService,
              T message,
              Serializer<T> serializer)
        Serialize and send a unicast message to the given service
        Parameters:
        toService - The service to send the message to
        message - The unserialized message
        serializer - The serializer that will serialize the message

      • incognito_addMessageConsumer

        void incognito_addMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<GrowableBuffer>> consumer)
        Add a unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to any service that passes through the local router.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The message consumer

      • incognito_addMessageConsumer

        <T> void incognito_addMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<T>> consumer,
                                      Deserializer<T> deserializer)
        Add a deserializing unicast message consumer that will receive messages addressed to any service that passes through the local router.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The message consumer
        deserializer - The deserializer that converts a binary message into an object to be consumed

      • incognito_removeMessageConsumer

        <T> void incognito_removeMessageConsumer(java.util.function.Consumer<UnicastMessage<T>> consumer)
        Remove an incognito consumer. The given consumer will stop receiving message callbacks.
        Parameters:
        consumer - The consumer to remove

      • incognito_send

        void incognito_send(RID fromService,
                    RID toService,
                    GrowableBuffer message)
        Send a unicast message as any service. This method is intended to be used by services that are able to connect multiple routers into a single environment.
        Parameters:
        fromService - The "sending" service
        toService - The service to send the message to
        message - The message

      • incognito_send

        <T> void incognito_send(RID fromService,
                        RID toService,
                        T message,
                        Serializer<T> serializer)
        Serialize and send a unicast message as any service. This method is intended to be used by services that are able to connect multiple routers into a single environment.
        Parameters:
        fromService - The "sending" service
        toService - The service to send the message to
        message - The unserialized message
        serializer - The serializer that will serialize the message
